name: Homelab nerds, unite! with Techno Tim (Changelog & Friends #9)
summary: Ok Homelabbers, itâ€™s time to unite! Join Adam and his new friend Techno Tim for 1.5 hours of homelab goodness. From networking and WiFi, virtualizing Ubuntu running Docker containers, to Home Assistant and automation, building a Kubernetes cluster, to gutting a perfectly good machine just to build exactly what you need...
